snippet: “The Culinarian: A Kitchen Desk Reference” is crammed with an unusual amount of information, organized alphabetically from “absinthe” to “zwieback.”
abstract: Barbara Ann Kipfer book The Culinarian: A Kitchen Desk Reference is crammed with an unusual amount of information, organized alphabetically from absinthe to zwieback.
lead_paragraph: “The Culinarian: A Kitchen Desk Reference” is crammed with an unusual amount of information, organized alphabetically from “absinthe” to “zwieback.”
